attributes.action: Get the new Olympic 2012 logo changed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the launch of the new 2012 Olympic logo today I feel I'm not the only one who thinks it is utter rubbish.  Please please change this horrendous Logo.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
